EditTextPreference.android:title: Bluetooth name
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The bluetooth device name of the Bioniscope electronics. e.g., HC-06

EditTextPreference.android:title: Digital time/sample offset
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The time it takes to capture a digital sample when the delay is set to 0us. In us.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Analogue time/sample offset
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The time it takes to capture an analogue sample when the delay is set to 0us. In us.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Zero point
EditTextPreference.android:summary: A decimal value from 0 to 255 inclusive representing the level the ADC reports 0V as.
